component.name: StatisticalDowscaling
component.definition: Definition of component type StatisticalDowscaling required

component.name: StatisticalDownscalingKeyProperties
component.definition: Definition of component type StatisticalDownscalingKeyProperties required

parameter.name: MaraunClassificationType
parameter.definition: The MaraunClassificationType is a classification following the system used by Maraun et. al. Reviews of Geophysics, 2010.

parameter.name: MethodType
parameter.definition: The MethodType describes the statistical core of the specific method.

parameter.name: CompoundMethod
parameter.definition: "Compound" means that several method types are used; it is distinguished from "hybrid" which implies dynamical and statistical used together.

parameter.name: Multi-SiteMethod
parameter.definition: Definition of property name Multi-SiteMethod required

parameter.name: CorrelationsAmongSites
parameter.definition: Definition of property name CorrelationsAmongSites required

value.name: method preserves spatial correlations among sites
method developed independently for each site

parameter.name: MultiVariateOutput
parameter.definition: Definition of property name MultiVariateOutput required

parameter.name: CorrelationsAmongPredictands
parameter.definition: Definition of property name CorrelationsAmongPredictands required

value.name: method developed independently for each predictand

parameter.name: DevelopedForExtremes
parameter.definition: Definition of property name DevelopedForExtremes required

parameter.name: Predictor-PredictandRelationship
parameter.definition: Where homegeneous implies same surface predictors and surface predictands (as in Rummukainen 1997), and heterogeneous implies upper-air predictors to surface predictands.

parameter.name: ExplicitBiasCorrection
parameter.definition: Is an explicit bias correction step included in this method? If so, please describe the type of bias correction used

component.name: MethodPhases
component.definition: Definition of component type MethodPhases required

parameter.name: FirstYear
parameter.definition: Definition of property name FirstYear required

parameter.name: LastYear
parameter.definition: Definition of property name LastYear required

parameter.name: AdditionalInformation
parameter.definition: For example, BCCA used even numbered years for calibration and odd numbered years for validation

parameter.name: FirstYear
parameter.definition: Definition of property name FirstYear required

parameter.name: LastYear
parameter.definition: Definition of property name LastYear required

parameter.name: ValidationType
parameter.definition: Definition of property name ValidationType required

parameter.name: ValidationTimeScale
parameter.definition: Definition of property name ValidationTimeScale required

parameter.name: ValidationFocus
parameter.definition: Definition of property name ValidationFocus required

parameter.name: ValidationMetricsAndIndices
parameter.definition: Definition of property name ValidationMetricsAndIndices required

parameter.name: AdditionalInformation
parameter.definition: For example, BCCA used even numbered years for calibration and odd numbered years for validation

parameter.name: FirstYear
parameter.definition: Definition of property name FirstYear required

parameter.name: LastYear
parameter.definition: Definition of property name LastYear required

parameter.name: AdditionalInformation
parameter.definition: Was anything done differently than in the other phases?

parameter.name: OutputDataType
parameter.definition: Definition of property name OutputDataType required

parameter.name: GridResolution
parameter.definition: Definition of property name GridResolution required

parameter.name: RegionDevelopedFor
parameter.definition: For example,BCSD was developed for the US.

parameter.name: RegionAppliedTo
parameter.definition: Definition of property name RegionAppliedTo required

parameter.name: DevelomentTimeWindow
parameter.definition: Definition of property name DevelomentTimeWindow required

parameter.name: AdditionalInformation
parameter.definition: For example, a list of three-letter acronymns indicating which months are used, or a description of the moving window.

component.name: Variables
component.definition: Definition of component type Variables required

component.name: LocalPredictands
component.definition: Definition of component type LocalPredictands required

parameter.name: CalibrationPredictandOriginType
parameter.definition: Definition of property name CalibrationPredictandOriginType required

parameter.name: CalibrationPredictandOriginName
parameter.definition: If the origin type is "station", then the specific stations will be defined in the simulation. This name refers to the preferred dataset (if it exists). If the origin type is "GCM," then this name refers to the GCM run idientified as specifically as possible. Also, if the origin type is "GCM," then this refers to a high-resolution GCM used in perfect model experiments.

parameter.name: PredictandPDFSubset
parameter.definition: Definition of property name PredictandPDFSubset required

parameter.name: PredictandFrequency
parameter.definition: Definition of property name PredictandFrequency required

parameter.name: TemporalTreatment
parameter.definition: Are any of the predictands related to different sets of predictors at specific times of year? If so, please list the predictands, corresponding months/seasons, and criteria for choosing the set of predictors. For example, in AARM, for precipitation, a predictor was selected for each month based on three variables using RMSE. Most methods do not have special treatment of predictands.

parameter.name: PredictandVariables
parameter.definition: Local surface variables.

parameter.name: PreprocessingMethod
parameter.definition: Unless otherwise specified (as with "sqrt for precipitation") these are applied to all predictands.

parameter.name: PreprocessingDescription
parameter.definition: Provide any other relevant details about the pre-processing step.

parameter.name: PostprocessingMethod
parameter.definition: Provide any relevant details about the post-processing step (e.g. how the full signal is rebuild: use of trends, seasonal cycle and downscalled anomalies). For example, for ARRM bias correction was done in the tails of the distribution.

component.name: LargeScalePredictors
component.definition: Definition of component type LargeScalePredictors required

parameter.name: CalibrationPredictorOriginType
parameter.definition: Definition of property name CalibrationPredictorOriginType required

parameter.name: CalibrationPredictorOriginName
parameter.definition: The name of the analysis (NCEP1, ERA40) or satellite

parameter.name: Predictors
parameter.definition: Large scale atmospheric variables.

parameter.name: PredictorPDFSubset
parameter.definition: Definition of property name PredictorPDFSubset required

parameter.name: PredictorFrequency
parameter.definition: Definition of property name PredictorFrequency required

parameter.name: TemporalTreatment
parameter.definition: Are any variables only used in specific times of year as predictors? If so, please list the variables and corresponding months/seasons. For example, in AARM, for precipitation, a predictor was selected for each month based on three variables using RMSE.

parameter.name: PreprocessingMethod
parameter.definition: unless otherwise specified (as with "sqrt for precipitation") these are applied to all predictors

parameter.name: PreprocessingDescription
parameter.definition: Provide any other relevant details about the pre-processing step.

component.name: WeatherTyping
component.definition: Definition of component type WeatherTyping required

parameter.name: ClassificationMethod
parameter.definition: Final classification of the days by assignation to a weather-type over the reconstruction period.

parameter.name: ClusteringMethod
parameter.definition: Definition of property name ClusteringMethod required

value.name: k-means
value.definition: The k-means algorithm assign each point to the cluster whose center (also called centroid) is neareast.

value.name: fuzzy c-means
value.definition: In fuzzy clustering, each point has a degree of belonging to clusters rather than belonging only to one cluster.

parameter.name: ClusteringMethod
parameter.definition: Definition of property name ClusteringMethod required

parameter.name: ClusterNumType
parameter.definition: Approach used determine the number of clusters of the method.

value.name: objective
value.definition: In objective methods the optimal number of cluster is automatically determined by the method.

value.name: subjective
value.definition: In subjective methods the number is fixed a-priori by the user.

parameter.name: NumberOfClusters
parameter.definition: Number of clusters defined a-priori.

component.name: WeatherGenerator
component.definition: Definition of component type WeatherGenerator required

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Definition of property name Method required

value.name: modification point (Monte-Carlo via Markov chain, MCMC)

parameter.name: SecondaryPredictands
parameter.definition: Definition of property name SecondaryPredictands required

component.name: TransferFunction
component.definition: Definition of component type TransferFunction required

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Definition of property name SchemeType required

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Definition of property name Method required

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Definition of property name Method required

parameter.name: NumberOfPrincipalComponents
parameter.definition: Definition of property name NumberOfPrincipalComponents required

component.name: BiasCorrection
component.definition: Definition of component type BiasCorrection required
